name: PQ Defense
description:
This game was made during Isart Digital "Game Week" game jam !

PQ Defense is a fast-paced top down shooter which was made in 5 days with a team of 7 people, the theme was "10 billion consumers".

STORY :

We are in the midst of a pandemic, containment has just been announced, and billions of consumers are looking for this essential good: toilet paper.

Protect your limited stock of triple-ply toilet paper by shooting cheap toilet paper rolls to your customers. Survive an entire week in this growing mall and the different waves of customers that will arrive throughout the day !

CONTROLS : MOVE :  SHOOT : MELEE : SWITCH WEAPON: WASD LEFT CLIC RIGHT CLIC 1-2 CREATORS :

Game Programmer :

  • Guillaume CHICLET : https://guillaumechiclet.itch.io/

Game Artists :

  • Alexandre KATIF
  • Roman RALITE
  • Louis-Marie SANIAL-AUJARD CATOT
  • Erik ARNEZ PANIAGUA

Game Designer :

  • Pierre MILLIN

Music & Sound Designer :

  • Jeremy ROZAS
Made with Unity
